## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [activateOOB(code)](./node-client.mfacontainer.activateoob.md) |  | Activates out-of-band (OOB) MFA authenticator. |
|  [activateTOTP(otp)](./node-client.mfacontainer.activatetotp.md) |  | Activates time-based one time password (TOTP) MFA authenticator. |
|  [authenticateWithOOB(options)](./node-client.mfacontainer.authenticatewithoob.md) |  | Performs MFA using out-of-band (OOB) MFA authenticator. |
|  [authenticateWithRecoveryCode(code)](./node-client.mfacontainer.authenticatewithrecoverycode.md) |  | Perform MFA using recovery code. |
|  [authenticateWithTOTP(options)](./node-client.mfacontainer.authenticatewithtotp.md) |  | Perform MFA using time-based one time password (TOTP) MFA authenticator. |
|  [createNewOOB(options)](./node-client.mfacontainer.createnewoob.md) |  | Creates new out-of-band (OOB) MFA authenticator. |
|  [createNewTOTP(options)](./node-client.mfacontainer.createnewtotp.md) |  | Creates new time-based one time password (TOTP) MFA authenticator. |
|  [deleteAuthenticator(id)](./node-client.mfacontainer.deleteauthenticator.md) |  | Delete the MFA authenticator with specified ID. |
|  [getAuthenticators()](./node-client.mfacontainer.getauthenticators.md) |  | Returns a list of configured MFA authenticators. |
|  [listRecoveryCode()](./node-client.mfacontainer.listrecoverycode.md) |  | Returns a list of MFA recovery code. |
|  [regenerateRecoveryCode()](./node-client.mfacontainer.regeneraterecoverycode.md) |  | Regenerates MFA recovery codes. |
|  [revokeAllTrustedDevices()](./node-client.mfacontainer.revokealltrusteddevices.md) |  | Revokes all MFA trusted devices. |
|  [triggerOOB(authenticatorID)](./node-client.mfacontainer.triggeroob.md) |  | Triggers out-of-band (OOB) MFA. |
